Detailed Description

Tridiagonal_Linear_Solver is a class handling problems of solving a tridiagonal linear system Ax=b.

rhs The vector b.

0 If succeeded.

Eigen::VectorXd & Tridiagonal_Linear_Solver::solve (  ) 

Solve the system.

Returns:
Reference to the solution vector x.

Using Thomas' algorithm to solve the system.

First step: Reduce the system to upper triangular.

Sencond step: Back substitution.
